BasculeBridge

public BasculeBridge(double supportedWeight)
Creates a BasculeBridge object with a maximum supported weight given as a parameter

Parameters:
supportedWeight - The maximum weight supported by the bridge
Method Detail

crossBridge

public boolean crossBridge(double myWeight)
Invoked when a thing or a person wants to cross the bridge. If the bridge is not raised and the weight of the thing/person is not too heavy for the bridge, a positive message is displayed and a true value is returned. Otherwise, a false value is returned.

Parameters:
myWeight - The weight of the person/thing
Returns:
True, if the person/thing can cross. False, otherwise.
